sentences.en: Perhaps the standout piece from Visvim's A/W '11 collection is the Hadrian jacket in light brown corduroy.
sentences.cn: 也许本季最为风骚的 Visvim 秋冬新品就是这件浅棕色的灯芯绒哈德良 parka 大衣。

sentences.en: At least my skin wouldn't be a standout here.
sentences.cn: 至少我的肤色在这里不是那么突兀的存在了。

sentences.en: China was the most conspicuous standout against this trend.
sentences.cn: 中国可谓反潮流的最为显著的典范。
